titles.title: The Day Of Thy Power (Jack W. Hayford)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May I stand, O Lord in this holy place May I worship Thee and behold Thy face. May I be transformed by Thy Word And Thy Spirit And behold the day of Thy power.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will stand, O Lord in this holy place. I will worship Thee and behold Thy face. I will be transformed by Thy Word And Thy Spirit And behold the day of Thy power.{/lang-eng}
